Question
========

Of 9 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 9 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 26 and the standard deviation is 36. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 1.03
* 1.38
* 2.17
* 3.11

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.03: Incorrect
* 1.38: Incorrect
* 2.17: Correct
* 3.11: Incorrect
